hero.title: Agentic AI on Salesforce resolves customer inquiries automatically
hero.subtitle: Consaience Partners delivers enterprise-grade automation that resolves inquiries, reduces manual workload, and scales customer service operations without additional headcount.
hero.supporting: Built on Salesforce Agentforce and Einstein AI, our solutions leverage your CRM data and Knowledge Articles to deliver fast, accurate, and governed responses.

capabilitiesDescription: Salesforce-native automation that understands inquiries, resolves them automatically, and escalates complex cases with full context.

capabilities.title: Increased case resolution capacity
capabilities.body: Automate repetitive inquiries within Salesforce, enabling agents to focus on high-value interactions requiring human judgment.

capabilities.title: Business-context aware AI
capabilities.body: Ground every response in your CRM data and Knowledge Articles to ensure accuracy, consistency, and brand alignment.

capabilities.title: Rapid deployment framework
capabilities.body: Deploy enterprise-grade Agentforce solutions in weeks using proven frameworks optimized for SMEs and global organizations.

capabilities.title: Enterprise-grade governance
capabilities.body: Leverage Salesforce permissions, governance frameworks, and audit trails to maintain compliance and security standards.

howItWorksDescription: A proven three-phase approach that connects Salesforce data, configures intelligent agents, and optimizes through continuous feedback.

howItWorks.body: Connect CRM records and Knowledge Articles to establish trusted data sources for AI-powered responses.
Configure Salesforce Agentforce and Einstein AI to understand inquiries and deliver context-aware, accurate guidance.
Launch multi-channel automation and continuously optimize using CRM analytics and agent feedback loops.

metricsDescription: Enterprise clients achieve significant operational efficiency gains while maintaining service quality standards.

metrics.label: Operational efficiency gain
metrics.caption: Reduction in manual handling for routine inquiries

ctaEndcap.title: Scale customer service operations without expanding headcount
ctaEndcap.subtitle: Schedule a strategy session to identify your highest-impact Salesforce Agentforce use case and accelerate ROI.
